definition:
If $(\sigma, \delta)$ is a left skew derivation on $R$, then we can
construct the [*(left) skew polynomial ring*]{}
$R[\theta;\sigma,\delta]$, which is made up of polynomials in an
indeterminate $\theta$ and left-hand coefficients from $R$, with
multiplication satisfying the relation
$$\theta \cdot r = \sigma(r) \cdot \theta + \delta(r)$$ for all $r$ in
$R$.
